title: Goodyear 1 Litre Screen Wash-5% Ethanol| Blue Colour Liquid| Red Lid| English Label| Antifreeze Windscreen Wash Liquid| Prevents Freezing Of The Glass Washer System Down| Provide Clear Vision
features: Advanced Antifreeze Protection: The Goodyear 1 Litre Screen Wash is specifically formulated with a 5% ethanol blend that provides reliable antifreeze protection. This powerful formula prevents the freezing of the glass washer system down to -5°C, ensuring that your windshield washer fluid remains functional even in colder climates.

Optimal Clarity in All Conditions: Engineered to deliver superior cleaning performance, it helps you maintain clear vision on the road by effectively removing dirt, grime, bugs, and other debris from your windshield. The blue-colored liquid not only visually assures its effectiveness but also ensures that your windshield remains streak-free

Versatile All-Season Formula: Whether it’s dealing with light summer dust or tough winter salt residues, the Screen Wash ensures your windshield stays clean and clear. Its antifreeze capability is particularly useful during winter months, preventing the glass washer system from freezing and ensuring smooth operation at temperatures as low as -2.5°C.

Distinctive and Easy-to-Use Packaging: Packaged in a convenient 1-litre bottle with a red lid, the Goodyear Screen Wash is easy to store and use. The blue liquid is easy to identify, reducing the risk of confusion with other car maintenance products. The bottle features a clear, English label with precise instructions for use

Efficient Windshield Cleaning: The Goodyear Screen Wash is more than just an antifreeze solution; it’s a highly effective cleaner that quickly breaks down and removes stubborn road grime, bird droppings, and insect splatter. The formula is designed to work with all types of windshield washer systems, providing consistent results
description: Product Description Ensure your windshield remains crystal clear and your driving visibility optimal with Goodyear 1 L Screen Wash, a premium antifreeze windscreen wash solution designed to perform in harsh weather conditions. This high-quality blue liquid screen wash, with a convenient red lid for easy identification, is formulated with 5% ethanol, offering effective cleaning and antifreeze protection that helps prevent the glass washer system from freezing, even in temperatures as low as -5°C. Goodyear 1 Litre Screen Wash is engineered to maintain your windshield’s clarity, providing superior cleaning power to remove dirt, grime, and stubborn residue from your windshield. This powerful formula not only cleans your windscreen effectively but also prevents the formation of ice, ensuring your windshield remains clear at temperatures down to -2.5°C, even during cold winter months. By keeping your glass washer system functioning smoothly, it enhances safety by delivering a clear view of the road ahead. Its compact size makes it perfect for storing in your car’s trunk, ready to use whenever you need it. The blue color liquid is easy to spot, and the red lid adds a pop of visibility, ensuring you can quickly identify the screen wash amongst your other car maintenance products. This antifreeze windscreen wash is more than just a cleaning agent—it’s an essential part of your vehicle’s maintenance routine. By preventing the freezing of your car’s washer system, it helps to avoid costly repairs and ensures that you can rely on your windscreen wipers and washers to perform effectively, no matter the weather conditions. Ingredients 5% Ethanol
